channel.title: Shop error?
channel.description:
My Code: autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 461 3231 3203 0 0 0 0 0 1 Get_all_your_armor_here![/code] shops.cfg [code]shop = 1 Armory 1 1 4119 100[/code] Client.Java [code] }else if (NPCID == 461) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = 1;//Armor Shop[/code]
Error: [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30) [/code]
Whats wrong? I keep trying to fix it but,all my efforts have been in vain! It looks fine to me...
Thanks in advance for help! Code God Of Rs

item.title: Shop error?
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Use tab bar, not space bar when editing .cfg files.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop error?

shops.cfg

Client.Java

Whats wrong? I keep trying to fix it but,all my efforts have been in vain! It looks fine to meâ€¦

Thanks in advance for help!
